channel.title: Music – w-inds.x G-DRAGON(BIGBANG)
channel.description: Recent content in w-inds.x G-DRAGON(BIGBANG) on Music

item.title: w-inds.x G-DRAGON(BIGBANG) - Rain Is Fallin'
item.description:
Ye steppin’in the club

everybodys like ‘aye!’

Yeah dats my jam

they play

I roll to the bar

and cop me a drink

–im tipsy,

game on, i say!

I gotta get right,

i sho do

This shorty im

so into (yeah)

And i think she just

came thru (oh)

Hey baby girl,

wut it do?

I think

i kno u too

C’mon, into the night,

DISCOTIC NIGHT
사프라이즈데

サプライズで
오-가나이즈!

オ-ガナイズ!
기미오 민나니 쇼오카이 시타이
きみ//みんな//しょう/かい/
君を皆に紹介したい

I got a feelin'

That this could

be the night

Wow-wow wow-wow

yeah-yeah-yeah

Rain is fallin'

over you & me
못토 아비요오
///あ/
もっと浴びよう
스폿 라잇

スポットライト
앤 샴페인

& シャンパン

C’mon, c’-c’-c’mon

I love you!

You’ve just changed me

Yeah-yeah-yeah-yeah,

you have
가츠테노 스캔달러스데
かつ/
嘗てのスキャンダラスで
데인저러스나

デンジャラスな
고이오 소라스 보쿠와
こい//そ///ぼく/
恋を逸らす僕は
모오 이나이

もういない
… 기미토노 데아이 이라이
///きみ/// で/あ // い/らい /
…君との出逢い以来

(you & me)

Aye aye put’em up

to the ceiling

Mayday mayday

im softly killin

Let the beat take

control of you (you)

Let the bass drum

come rollin’ through

Dancin, movin,

steppin, grooving,

Jumpin come on do

as you choose (get up)

Cause we gon'

keep this true

Its just GD and U

(and u and u and u..)

C’mon, into the night,

DISCOTIC NIGHT
에이티즈 뮤직토 기미니
///////////きみ/
80’s musicと君に
오도라사레타이
おど/
踊らされたい

I got a feelin’ that

this could be the nite

Wow-wow wow-wow

yeah-yeah-yeah

Rain is fallin'

over you & me
못토 아비요오
///あ/
もっと浴びよう
스폿 라잇

スポットライト
앤 샴페인

& シャンパン

C’mon, c’-c’-c’mon
아비루 스폿 라잇
あ/
浴びるスポットライト
샴페인

シャンパン

I love you!

You’ve just changed me

I love you!

You’ve changed me
가츠테노 스캔달러스데
かつ/
嘗てのスキャンダラスで
데인저러스나

(you & me)

We go all night long!

[We go all night long]

We go on & on!

[We go on & on!]
마루데 하야리노 요오
/// は/や /
まるで流行りのよう
[마루데 하야리노 요오]
//// は/や /
[まるで流行りのよう]
마와루요
まわ/
回るよ
미라-볼

ミラ-ボ-ル
데모 아이와 후헨
//あい// ふ/へん /
でも愛は普遍
이츠노 요데모 무겐다이
///よ///む/げん/だい/
いつの世でも無限大

so lucky! Yeah
